message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_USERCASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: The following case(s), have been reassigned by %2s : %1s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_REASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: The following appeal case(s), have been reassigned by %2s : %1s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_CASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on %2n by %3s

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_ISSUECASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on the following appeal cases by %3s : %2n

message.name: INF_SUPERVISOR_ASSIGN_USERCASE_NOTIFICATION_TEXT
message.locale: You have been assigned the %1s role on the following cases by %3s : %2n

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USERNAME_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a new owner to reassign the appeal case(s) to, or choose Auto Reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USERNAME_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please indicate only one option, to reassign to a user, or to perform an auto reassign.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_USER_INACTIVE
message.locale: User %1s is not an active user, and appeal cases cannot be reassigned to this user.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_ISSUE_REASSIGN_CASE_EMPTY
message.locale: No appeal case has been selected for reassignment.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_CASE_ISSUE_DATE_EMPTY
message.locale: The field 'Choose Date' cannot be blank.
